Name: Inception
Description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets is given a chance at redemption.

Name: Parasite
Description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household.

Name: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Name: Spirited Away
Description: A young girl enters a mysterious world of spirits and must find a way to free her parents.

Name: The Dark Knight
Description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos in Gotham City.

Name: The Matrix
Description: A computer programmer discovers a mysterious world of digital reality.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: A young hobbit and his companions embark on a quest to destroy a powerful ring.

Name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Description: Peter Parker seeks Doctor Strange's help to make people forget about Spider-Man's identity.

Name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy.

Name: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Description: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.

Name: The Matrix (3D)
Description: A computer programmer discovers a mysterious world of digital reality.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (3D)
Description: A young hobbit and his companions embark on a quest to destroy a powerful ring.

Name: Spider-Man: No Way Home (3D)
Description: Peter Parker seeks Doctor Strange's help to make people forget about Spider-Man's identity.
